Name: market for concrete, 35MPa | concrete, 35MPa | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster
Description: This activity represents the market for concrete for South Africa. A market activity covers the step from supplier to consumer of a certain product in a given geography. In a market activity the transport is therefore reported, transport distances for this activity are taken from five local ready mix companies, transport distances in South Africa are significant given the countryâ€™s territory extension and dispersion of cities. Concrete produced in South Africa is solely consumed in the country itself, no exports are reported (Conrete Institute, South Africa).
